title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2J.04 - Number and Size of Signs and Logo Sign Panels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2J.04 - Number and Size of Signs and Logo Sign Panels

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraphs 01, 06, and 07. INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 02A There shall be no more than three logo sign panels for
one of the two service types on the same sign or sign assembly. Standard: 05A The design of Specific Service signs and logo sign
panels in New York shall be as provided in Sign Drawing
SD-G10. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2J.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
